text: int check ( int n ) { if ( n > 0 ) return n + check ( n - 1 ) ; else return 0 ; } int main ( ) { int t , n , i , j , sum , * a = NULL , tl , temp ; scanf ( "%d" , & tl ) ; while ( tl -- ) { sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; a = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { temp = 0 ; for ( j = i + 1 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ j ] > a [ i ] ) { temp ++ ; i = j ; } else break ; } sum = sum + check ( temp ) ; } free ( a ) ; a = NULL ; printf ( "%d\n" , sum + n ) ; } return 0 ; }
